summary: Criminals have chosen an ordinary man to carry drugs and jewels in his car across the border. The problem is that this man turned out too much ordinary.
cast: Bourvil|Louis de Funès|Venantino Venantini|Henri Génès|Lando Buzzanca|Jacques Eyser|Henri Virlojeux|Jean Meyer|Jack Ary|Jean-Marie Bon|Guy Delorme|Jean Droze|Jacques Ferrière|Guy Grosso|Michel Modo|Yvon Jeanclaude|Bob Lerick|Bernard Meusnier|Pierre Roussel|Louis Viret|Beba Loncar|Alida Chelli|Walter Chiari|Germaine de France|José Luis de Vilallonga|Nicole Desailly|Robert Duranton|Marius Gaidon|Jean Minisini|Daniela Rocca|Saro Urzì|Dan Vadis|Nino Vingelli
keywords: simple man|car damage|car driving|car driver|naples italy
title: El hombre del Cadillac
